com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event

Class MleOldEventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.event.MleOldEventDispatcher

  • public class MleOldEventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    MleEventDispatcher is used to synchronize the dispatching of Magic Lantern runtime events.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Detail

      • addEventCallback

        public boolean addEventCallback(int id,
                                IMleEventCallback cb,
                                java.lang.Object clientdata,
                                int priority)
        Add an event callback handler.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event id.
        cb - The IMleEventCallback handler to add.
        clientdata - Client data associated with the callback handler.
        priority - The event priority.
        Returns:
        If the handler was successfully added, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • addEventCallback

        public boolean addEventCallback(int id,
                                IMleEventCallback cb,
                                java.lang.Object clientdata)
        Add an event callback handler. The default priority is used.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event id.
        cb - The IMleEventCallback handler to add.
        clientdata - Client data associated with the callback handler.
        Returns:
        If the handler was successfully added, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • deleteEventCallback

        public boolean deleteEventCallback(int id)
        Remove an event callback handler from the collection of callbacks that can be processed.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier for the callback handler to be removed.
        Returns:
        If the handler was successfully removed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • dispatchEvents

        public void dispatchEvents()
        Dispatch all events that have been placed in the delayed queue.

      • processEvent

        public boolean processEvent(int id,
                            java.lang.Object calldata,
                            short type)
        Process the event specified by the event id.

        If the event type associated with the id is MLE_EVENT_IMMEDIATE, then the event will dispatched immediately. If the event type is MLE_EVENT_DELAYED, then the event will be placed on a FIFO queue to be processed at a later date (when dispatchEvents() is called).

        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        calldata - An Object containing the data to be processed along with the event.
        type - The type of event, either MLE_EVENT_IMMEDIATE or MLE_EVENT_DELAYED.
        Returns:
        If the event is successfully processed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • enableEventCallback

        public boolean enableEventCallback(int id)
        Enable the callback handler for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        Returns:
        If the event callback is successfully enabled, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • disableEventCallback

        public boolean disableEventCallback(int id)
        Disable the callback handler for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        Returns:
        If the event is successfully disabled, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • changeEventCBPriority

        public boolean changeEventCBPriority(int id,
                                     int key)
        Change the dispatch priority for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        id - The composite event identifier.
        key - The new priority.
        Returns:
        If the event priority is successfully changed, then true will be returned. Otherwise, false will be returned.
